sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, movie_info_idx mi_idx, movie_keyword mk
WHERE t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.id = mk.movie_id AND t.kind_id  >  2 AND t.production_year  >  2012
